basic_info.description: Common parameters describing the target and/or observation; a subset taken from the Instrument Keyword and Observation Parameter sections.

Target Info.description: Parameters regarding the target of observation

Instrument Info.description: Parameters describing the type of instrument and observing mode

Observation Info.description: Parameters regarding the date, type, and state of an observation

observation_parameters.description: Information about the JWST Observation, as seen in a MAST Portal Search. See Column Descriptions for more details.

Observation Information.description: Parameters regarding the date, type, and state of an observation

Target Information.description: Parameters regarding the target of observation

Product Information.description: Parameters describing the type of data product produced during the observation

Instrument Information.description: Parameters describing the type of instrument and observing mode

Access Information.description: Parameters related to data access for the given data product

instrument_keywords.description: Information from the FITS headers of the science data products. See Keyword Metadata for more details.

Basic parameters.description: Basic parameters of file creation and data processing

IFU cube parameters.description: Parameters specific to 3D integral field unit (IFU) observations

Programmatic information.description: Parameters regarding the type of observing proposal

Observation identifiers.description: Parameters regarding the date, type, and state of an observation

Visit information.description: Parameters regarding an individual telescope visit of an observation

Target information.description: Parameters regarding the target of observation

Instrument configuration information.description: Parameters describing the type of instrument and its configuration for an observation

Exposure parameters.description: Parameters related to number, type, and length of exposures during a given observation

Association parameters.description: Parameters describing files containing information on associated observations

Subarray parameters.description: Parameters relevant to any subarray instrument configuration

Dither information.description: Parameters describing any instrument dithering during an observation

Focus Adjust Mechanism parameters.description: Parameters decribing the NIRCAM focus adjustment

Aperture information.description: Parameters relevant to the science aperture used

Time information.description: Parameters related to the time of observation

Resampling parameter information.description: Parameters related to any product resampling that occurred during pipeline processing

WCS parameters.description: Parameters related to the World Coordinate System (WCS) of the observation

Guide star information.description: Parameters relevant to guiding and guide star observations

Background information.description: Parameters relevant to any background subtraction during pipeline processing

Product Information.description: Parameters describing the type of data product and public release date
